name: nemp3
description: A music download store using payment and token assets on the NEM blockchain.

scripts.server: npx nodemon --ignore client/ -r dotenv/config index.js dotenv_config_path=dev.env
scripts.production: npx nodemon --ignore client/ -r dotenv/config index.js dotenv_config_path=prod.env
scripts.dev: npx concurrently "npm run server" "npm run client"
scripts.prod: npx concurrently "npm run production" "npm run client"
scripts.dev-docker: npx concurrently "npm run server-docker" "npm run client"

author: Christopher Leary
